WorkItem.Description: When analyzed with Visua Studio Team Suite's Source Analysis or FXCop, WPF Dynamic Data Display has a number of outstanding conformance issues that ought to be corrected/suppressed in code, as appropriate.
WorkItem.Summary: WPF Dynamic Data Display needs running through VSTS Code Analysis/FXCop

Comments.Message:
Thank you for your remark.

We've used FXCop to analyze the source code of DynamicDataDisplay, and a big number of its suggestions were taken into account.
Before releasing next version of DynamicDataDisplay we will analyze it again.

Mikhail Brinchuk, DynamicDataDisplay Dev Team
